product_name: Dr. AltheaGreen Relief Amino Gel Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganSustainable PackagingDr. Althea Green Relief Amino Gel Cleanser is a gentle, foaming cleanser designed for oily, combination, and acne-prone skin. It helps minimize frictional irritation while effectively removing excess oil for a fresh, clean feel.
details: DetailsBenefitsClinically Proven for Sensitive Skin Free: Gentle foam enriched with hyaluronic acid, betula platyphylla japonica juice, and betaine to minimize irritation and deliver long-lasting hydration.Perfect for Oily or Acne-Prone Skin: Fine bubbles smaller than the average pore size provide deep cleansing and effectively control excess sebum.Refreshing and Effective: Uses coconut-derived and amino acid-based surfactants to remove makeup, excess oil, and impurities without stripping the skin.Maintain Healthy Skin Barrier: Low pH formula (5.0â€“6.0) and micro-bubble foam support a healthy skin barrier while ensuring a thorough pore cleanse.Key IngredientsBetaine: A natural humectant that helps retain skin moisture and reduce irritationBetula Platyphylla Japonica Juice: Rich in minerals and amino acids, it soothes and hydrates sensitive skinHydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid: Provides deep hydration by penetrating the skin's layers, leaving it plump and moisturizedItem 2647061How To UseWet your face and dispense a small amount into your palm. Lather with water, gently massage in circular motions, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Alaninate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Betula Platyphylla Japonica Juice, Sodium Chloride, Quillaja Saponaria Bark Extract, Cynanchum Atratum Extract, Althaea Rosea Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Betaine, Lauryl Hydroxysultaine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Coco-Glucoside, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Citric Acid, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Phytate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dextrin, Butylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hexylene Glycol, Ceramide NP, Glyceryl Caprylate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract.
how_to_use: Wet your face and dispense a small amount into your palm. Lather with water, gently massage in circular motions, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
